ygData.subject: Re: Research
ygData.msgSnippet: ... says That for level 16 spells I need page 23 for levitate 24 for disempower and 26 for Mesmerization. ... a time) and hit combine. I get the message those
ygData.messageBody:
At 08:16 AM 7/8/99 -0400, you wrote:
>First of all thanks for the replies on Rune I.
>
>I still have a question on research though.
>
>I was on baelish's EQ Enchanter site looking at the research section, it
says That for level 16 spells I need page 23 for levitate 24 for disempower
and 26 for Mesmerization.
>
> My problem is that I have had all these pages, put them in the book(one at
a time) and hit combine. I get the message those items in that combination
failed to produce anything.
>
>
>I was then told I have to have the left and right pages, but under the page
description It says just page 23 or page 24 of Tasarins Grimoire.
>
>What am I doing wrong?
>I also was not allowed to put any practices into Research.
>
>Sorry for the long winded questions but I am a bit confused about research.
>
>Zahlhedren
>Karana

For Tasarins the pages do indeed coem in halves. They appear to be torn from
a book and will show a definate tear along one side or another. If you have
enough pages you will eventually see that there are two different graphics
for Tasarins pages.

For Velishouls the pages are numbered consecutively, with some pages being
faded.

If you have not first invested the money at the trainer tog et the research
skill as high as possible do so it will save you time and money in the long
run. At that point you want to seek 23, 24 etc just to practice to raise the
skill. Be aware that only mesmerizarion (which i rarely use at level 30) is
research, disempower and levitate are both available for sale.
In fact the only two spells I can recall actually having to research so far
are tepid deeds and Mesmerization.
--
Silverlock, ICQ 474725
